courses.title: Communication (Core)
courses.prerequisite: For all 010 courses: Satisfactory scores on English portion of ACT test and TSI examination or ENGL 0301.
courses.notes: See General Education Core for more details. Options: ENGL 1301.

courses.title: Calculus I
courses.prerequisite: MATH 2412 with a grade of 'C' or better; or passing the Precalculus Exemption Test administered by the Department of Mathematics.

courses.title: American History
courses.notes: See General Education Core for more details. Options: HIST 1301 or HIST 2327.

courses.title: Learning to be a Physicist
courses.notes: Physics core requirement.

courses.title: Social and Behavioral Sciences
courses.notes: See General Education Core for course options.

courses.title: Inquiry Approaches to Teaching
courses.prerequisite: Must be in a College of Sciences major.
courses.notes: A criminal background check will be required, and a tuberculosis test may be required before the first field experience. Special permission from a UTeach co-director is required to enroll in UTCH 1101 and UTCH 1102 concurrently.

courses.title: Learning Framework
courses.notes: As required, based on credit hours earned, TSI status, High school rank, major declaration.

courses.title: Communication (Core)
courses.prerequisite: For all 010 courses: Satisfactory scores on English portion of ACT test and TSI examination or ENGL 0301.
courses.notes: See General Education Core for more details. Options: ENGL 1302 or ENGL 1305.

courses.title: American History
courses.notes: See General Education Core for more details. Options: HIST 1302 or HIST 2328.

courses.prerequisite: Grade of 'C' or better in the following: BIOL 1406, BIOL 1407; or CHEM 1111, CHEM 1112, CHEM 1311, CHEM 1312; or MATH 1314 or MATH 1414; or PHYS 1401, PHYS 1402 or PHYS 2425, PHYS 2426 or PHYS 2411, PHYS 2412; and UTCH 1101, UTCH 1102 or consent of instructor.

courses.title: Classroom Interactions
courses.prerequisite: (a) An institutional grade point average of at least 2.75, (b) UTCH 1102 with a grade of 'C' or better, (c) UTCH 3301 with a grade of 'C' or better, and (d) admission to the Teacher Education Program.
